Attributes.description: Variational calculus, Lagrangian dynamics, rigid body motion including free and forced precession, Hamiltonian mechanics, Poisson brackets, canonical coordinates, Hamilton-Jacobi theory, action angle variables. Introduction to dynamical chaos: determinism, Lyapunov exponents.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 216, ENPH 270 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255, MATH 256, MATH 258.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Biological, Room: Sciences
